description:
RollBack Rx client is a robust system restore utility that enables home users and IT professionals to easily restore a PC to a time before certain events occurred.
RollBack Rx makes it easy for users of all skill levels to quickly and easily repair PC issues - saving time, money and PC trouble.
This solution is especially useful in the case of a situation where you cannot get into Windows.
Simply restart the computer into its sub-console and you will be able to access all previous data, settings and programs.
Takes just seconds - in the time it takes to reboot your computer, you are fully operational again!
======= Notes =======
Select Advanced on type installation.
author: Horizon DataSys
